sections.innovationWindowDescription: Every day from 9 to 10, AOIN opens its shutters to offer exclusive, handpicked products for a limited time only.

clearCartModal.title: Clear Cart
clearCartModal.message: Are you sure you want to clear your entire cart? This action cannot be undone.

wishlist.title: My Wishlist
wishlist.emptyDescription: Save your favorite products to your wishlist to keep track of items you love and want to purchase later.

contact.title: Browse Topics
contact.signInForHelp: Sign in to get help with recent orders

footer.newsletterDescription: Receive our latest updates about our products & promotions

cashBack.title: Cash Back
cashBack.description: When paying for products via Dasun Wallet

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services, shipping, returns, and more.
faq.contact: Still have questions? Contact us at

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept a wide range of payment methods including credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All transactions are secure and encrypted to ensure your payment information is protected.

shipping.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping.answer: Shipping times vary depending on your location and the shipping method chosen. Domestic orders typically arrive within 3-5 business days, while international orders may take 7-14 business days. Express shipping options are available at checkout for faster delivery.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be unused and in their original packaging. To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team through your account dashboard. Once your return is approved, we'll provide a prepaid shipping label and process your refund within 5-7 business days of receiving the returned item.

international.question: Do you offer international shipping?
international.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by location. You can see the exact shipping costs and estimated delivery time by entering your address at checkout. Please note that additional customs fees or import duties may apply depending on your country.

tracking.question: How can I track my order?
tracking.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a confirmation email with a tracking number. You can use this number to track your package on our website or through the carrier's tracking system. You can also view your order status and tracking information in your account dashboard.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: At Aoin, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you shop with us.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Aoin, your trusted destination for fashion, technology, and lifestyle products. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you visit our website, use our mobile app, make purchases, or interact with our services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information that is automatically collected when you use our services.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use your information to provide, improve, and personalize our services

informationSharing.title: How We Share Your Information
informationSharing.content: We may share your information with trusted partners and service providers

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your shopping experience and provide personalized content.

privacyRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
privacyRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Aoin's services are not intended for children under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Aoin operates globally and may transfer your information to countries other than your own.

policyUpdates.title: Updates to This Policy
policyUpdates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us

freeShipping.title: Premium Free Shipping
freeShipping.description: On all orders over $75 within the United States

fastProcessing.title: Fast Processing
fastProcessing.description: Same-day processing for orders before 2 PM EST

standard.title: Aoin Standard Shipping
standard.description: Delivery in 3-5 business days within the continental United States.

express.title: Aoin Express Shipping
express.description: Delivery in 2 business days within the continental United States.
features: Order must be placed before 2 PM EST for same-day processing

overnight.title: Aoin Priority Overnight
overnight.description: Next business day delivery within the continental United States.
features: Order must be placed before 1 PM EST for same-day processing
Not available for PO Boxes or APO/FPO addresses

international.title: International Shipping
features: Standard International: $14.99, delivery in 7-14 business days
Express International: $29.99, delivery in 3-5 business days
Customs duties and taxes may apply and are the responsibility of the recipient

orderProcessing.title: Order Processing
orderProcessing.content: All orders are processed within 1-2 business days from the time of purchase. Orders placed during weekends or holidays will be processed on the next business day.

restrictions.title: Shipping Restrictions
restrictions.content: Some products cannot be shipped to certain locations due to regulations. If this applies to an item in your order, we will notify you.

delays.title: Shipping Delays
delays.content: While we make every effort to ship and deliver orders according to the estimated delivery times, there may be occasional delays due to weather conditions, customs issues, or other circumstances beyond our control.

questions.title: Questions About Your Shipment?
questions.content: Our dedicated shipping support team is here to help

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.introduction: Welcome to Aoin, your trusted destination for fashion, technology, and lifestyle products. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Aoin website, mobile applications, and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Please read them carefully before making any purchases.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
content: By accessing or using the Aoin website, mobile applications, or any other features, technologies, or functionalities offered by Aoin on our platform or through any other means (collectively, 'Services'), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not access or use our Services.

These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use our Services. By using our Services, you represent that you are at least 18 years old or have parental consent to use our Services.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any material changes by updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this page and posting the updated Terms on our website. Your continued use of the Services after such modifications will constitute your acknowledgment and acceptance of the modified Terms.

account.title: Account Registration
content: To access certain features of our Services, you may be required to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

You are responsible for safeguarding your password and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify Aoin immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.
You may not create an account for anyone other than yourself, and you may not create more than one account per person. We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these Terms.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.introduction: When using our Services, you agree not to:
rules: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe upon the rights of others, including intellectual property rights
Use the Services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Interfere with or disrupt the Services or servers or networks connected to the Services
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Services
Use any robot, spider, scraper, or other automated means to access the Services
Create or submit unwanted email, comments, or other forms of commercial or harassing communications
Impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity
Upload, post, or transmit any content that is harmful, threatening, abusive, or objectionable
Attempt to circumvent any security measures or access controls

products.title: Products and Services
content: Aoin strives to display product descriptions, images, and pricing as accurately as possible. However, we do not guarantee that all information is complete or correct. Product images are for illustrative purposes and may not reflect the exact appearance of the product.

In the event of a pricing error, Aoin reserves the right to refuse or cancel any orders placed for products listed at the incorrect price. We will notify you if your order is affected by a pricing error.

Availability of products and delivery times shown on our website are estimates only and are not guaranteed. We reserve the right to limit the quantities of any products that we offer and to discontinue products at any time.

orderingPayment.title: Ordering and Payment
content: When you place an order, you offer to purchase the product at the price indicated. Our acceptance of your order happens when we send you an order confirmation email.

You agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information for all purchases made through our site. You agree to promptly update your account and other information, including your email address and credit card information, so that we can complete your transactions and contact you as needed.

All payments must be made in full at the time of purchase. We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets. Payment processing is handled by secure third-party providers.

shippingDelivery.title: Shipping and Delivery
content: Aoin will make every effort to ship products within the estimated timeframes. However, shipping times are estimates and not guarantees. Aoin is not responsible for delays due to shipping carrier issues, weather, customs, or other circumstances beyond our control.
For more information about our shipping practices, please review our Shipping Policy.

returnsRefunds.title: Returns and Refunds
content: Aoin offers a 30-day return policy for most items. Some products have specific return conditions that will be noted in the product description or in our Returns & Refunds Policy.
For detailed information on our return process, eligible items, and refund methods, please review our Returns & Refunds Policy.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
content: The Services and all contents, including but not limited to text, images, graphics, logos, icons, audio clips, and software, are the property of Aoin or its content suppliers and protected by United States and international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

The trademarks, service marks, and logos used and displayed on our Services are registered and unregistered trademarks of Aoin and others. Nothing on our Services should be construed as granting any license or right to use any trademarks without the prior written permission of Aoin.

You may not copy, reproduce, distribute, transmit, display, perform, publish, license, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell any information obtained from our Services without our prior written consent.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
content: THE SERVICES AND ALL INFORMATION, CONTENT, MATERIALS, PRODUCTS, AND SERVICES INCLUDED ON OR OTHERWISE MADE AVAILABLE TO YOU THROUGH THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN 'AS IS' AND 'AS AVAILABLE' BASIS, UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED IN WRITING. Aoin MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, AS TO THE OPERATION OF THE SERVICES, OR THE INFORMATION, CONTENT, MATERIALS, PRODUCTS, OR SERVICES INCLUDED ON OR OTHERWISE MADE AVAILABLE TO YOU THROUGH THE SERVICES.
TO THE FULL EXTENT PERMISSIBLE BY LAW, Aoin DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
content: Aoin WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES OF ANY KIND ARISING FROM THE USE OF THE SERVICES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE, AND CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED IN WRITING.

CERTAIN STATE LAWS DO NOT ALLOW LIMITATIONS ON IMPLIED WARRANTIES OR THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF CERTAIN DAMAGES. IF THESE LAWS APPLY TO YOU, SOME OR ALL OF THE ABOVE DISCLAIMERS, EXCLUSIONS, OR LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU, AND YOU MIGHT HAVE ADDITIONAL RIGHTS.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Aoin, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers from and against all losses, expenses, damages and costs.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Services, to understand our practices regarding the collection and use of your information.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect, and the invalid or unenforceable provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary.

entireAgreement.title: Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.content: These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, Return Policy, and Shipping Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Aoin regarding the use of our Services.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
contact.name: Aoin E-commerce Platform
